entries.name: from(ary)
entries.desc: Creates a new SourceList from an array of sources.

entries.name: <<(obj)
entries.desc: Appends obj to the source list which may be a Gem::Source, URI or URI String.

entries.name: clear()
entries.desc: Removes all sources from the SourceList.

entries.name: delete(source)
entries.desc: Deletes source from the source list which may be a Gem::Source or a URI.

entries.name: each()
entries.desc: Yields each source URI in the list.

entries.name: each_source(&b)
entries.desc: Yields each source in the list.

entries.name: empty?()
entries.desc: Returns true if there are no sources in this SourceList.

entries.name: first()
entries.desc: Returns the first source in the list.

entries.name: include?(other)
entries.desc: Returns true if this source list includes other which may be a Gem::Source or a source URI.

entries.name: replace(other)
entries.desc: Replaces this SourceList with the sources in other  See << for acceptable items in other.

entries.name: to_a()
entries.desc: Returns an Array of source URI Strings.
